ai.summary: A short, easy 0.7 km woodland loop along the Red Path in Alder Coppice, United Kingdom. Perfect for beginners and families, this gentle stroll provides shade, a few small roots, and a peaceful woodland atmosphere, typically taking about 10–15 minutes at a relaxed pace.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, packed-earth track with occasional tree roots and subtle uneven sections. There can be damp or muddy patches after rain; surfaces are generally easy for walking and accessible to most visitors on dry days, but expect some grip changes in wet conditions.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on the marked Red Path and supervise children at all times. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Check the forecast for rain, as surfaces can become slippery. Be mindful of other walkers, avoid wildlife disturbance, and carry a small amount of water. In an emergency in the UK, dial 999.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or light hiking boots
Weather-appropriate clothing (layers) and a light rain jacket
Small map or phone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn (April to October) offer the best conditions and scenery; winter visits may be muddy and daylight is shorter.

seo.title: Alder Coppice: Red Path – Easy 0.7 km Woodland Walk in the UK
